benchmark_details.name: VideoToolBench
benchmark_details.overview: VideoToolBench is a tool-using instruction-following dataset designed to probe the abilities of video LLMs in invoking tools for video understanding tasks.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To enhance video LLMs' tool usage capabilities and facilitate continual learning in real-world scenarios dealing with dynamic tool data.

data.source: Instruction following data generated via GPT-3.5-turbo for various tool functions in the context of video understanding.

methodology.calculation: Metrics calculated based on the correct invocation of tools and responses by LLMs.
methodology.interpretation: Higher average accuracy indicates better performance in invoking tools correctly.
methodology.validation: Tested on both established benchmarks and VideoToolBench dataset.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.privacy_and_anonymity: User data handled according to standard privacy practices.
ethical_and_legal_considerations.data_licensing: Publicly available upon publication with restrictions on commercial usage.
